OrgName.entry: ST LUKES COMMUNITY SPECIALIST PALLIATIVE CARE TEAM

AltName.entry: ST LUKES HOSPICE AT HOME TEAM (FORMER NAME)

Desc.entry: Offers specialist support and advice to patients with cancer and other life limiting illnesses, and their carers, in the home. Works closely with community nurses to offer individuals increased choices of care and support throughout their illness. Referral through GP, health professional, social services or voluntary agency using the Sheffield Specialist Palliative Care referral form.
